title: So Much News, So Little Time - Whitaker, California Fires & Trump's WWI Rain Check | Jeffrey Wright
itunes:title: So Much News, So Little Time - Whitaker, California Fires & Trump's WWI Rain Check | Jeffrey Wright
description:
Recounts begin for Florida's Senate and governor's races, President Trump has a terrible week at home and abroad, and actor Jeffrey Wright discusses "We Are Not Done Yet."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
